thread.section_title: Oakfurnitureland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oakfurnitureland | oakfurnitureland.com | 2 of 8
thread.title: Donna Briggs

author: Donna Briggs
title: Donna Briggs
text:
Entered the Kingsway store and recieved a lovely soft approach, Grant established our needs, showed us he was actively listening to us and showed us exactly what we wanted, we purchased with ease and in no way confused on what we are to expect next delivery ect.
The prices were nowhere near what I had expected we made our choice and totaly within our budget. Would highly recommend this company without hesitation.
